general.greeting: Hi! I can start or update your booking. What do you need?
general.help: Share your address, size, schedule, or notes and I’ll keep your booking draft updated.
general.why_guided: We guide the chat so pricing stays predictable, accessible, and easy to review.
general.start_booking: Say start booking to open the guided steps for address, size, cadence, and time.
general.update_booking: Tell me what changed—address, time, extras—and I’ll refresh the draft summary.
general.change_language: Use the Language button or say your language and I’ll switch the UI and replies.
general.accessibility: The chat supports keyboard navigation, quick replies, and screen-reader friendly labels.
general.quick_replies: Use the chips under the chat to answer fast; they mirror what you can type.
general.keyboard_shortcuts: Press Tab and Enter to move through inputs; quick replies are standard buttons.
general.resume_draft: If you signed in, I keep your draft; reopen book.html to continue where you left off.
general.clear_draft: Say clear draft to remove saved answers and restart the guided flow.
general.location_permission: Allow location to autofill your address; you can also type or paste it manually.
general.data_privacy: We store only the booking draft locally until you submit; see privacy for details.
general.data_delete: Ask to delete my data and I’ll clear your local draft and session tokens.
general.data_export: For exports, contact support and we’ll send a copy of your booking data.
general.contact_support: Type support to reach a human via chat or email; we respond within a business day.
general.live_agent: If you need a person, I can log your request and hand off to support.
general.provider_path: If you’re a cleaner, pick Provider to open verification and job feed onboarding.
general.customer_path: Customers follow role → category → booking chat to finish a draft.
general.app_navigation: Use the header links for Login, Register, or to jump back to the landing page.
general.login_help: If you can’t log in, try resetting your password or contact support for assistance.
general.register_help: To register, share your email and role; I’ll guide you through the next steps.
general.logout: Use the logout button to clear your session and local booking data.
general.offline_mode: If AI is offline, I keep you in the guided flow and update the summary locally.
general.summary_view: On desktop the draft shows on the right; on mobile use the Summary button.
general.mobile_summary: Tap Summary to slide the draft drawer in and review details before submitting.
general.save_progress: Signed-in users keep progress across devices; guests stay local to this browser.
general.security: We use HTTPS and scoped storage; providers and customers have separated routes.
general.payment_security: Payments are processed over encrypted channels with verified processors.
general.autofill_toggle: You can turn location autofill off anytime; I’ll stick to manual address entry.
faq.start_flow: To start, share your address, space type, and preferred time—I’ll open the guided steps.
faq.update_flow: Tell me what changed—address, size, cadence, or extras—and I’ll refresh the draft.
faq.change_address: You can update the address in chat or in the summary; I’ll keep one primary address.
faq.add_entry: Add entry notes like buzzer, floor, parking, or key handoff so cleaners arrive smoothly.
faq.add_pets: Let us know about pets; we’ll note allergies and match a comfortable cleaner.
faq.add_allergies: Share allergies or sensitivities so we adjust supplies or assign the right pro.
faq.add_fragile: List fragile items or rooms to skip; we’ll flag them in the instructions.
faq.change_size: Pick studio, 1–2 bedroom, or house; include bathrooms for accurate timing.
faq.size_guide: Studios are up to 45m², 1–2 bedrooms up to ~90m², houses above that.
faq.add_bathrooms: Tell me how many bathrooms; each adds cleaning time and may adjust the estimate.
faq.change_frequency: Choose once, weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly; we adjust timing and discounts.
faq.frequency_options: Recurring bookings get consistent slots and a repeat discount after the first visit.
faq.change_schedule: Share your ideal day and time; I’ll propose an arrival window and alternatives.
faq.arrival_window: We offer arrival windows (e.g., 9–11) to handle traffic; we text when en route.
faq.same_day: Same-day slots are limited; I’ll tell you if we can place you today or propose tomorrow.
faq.weekend_available: Weekend visits are limited in some cities and may carry a small surcharge.
faq.holiday_available: Holiday availability is slim; we’ll confirm manually or propose the nearest date.
faq.flexible_time: If you’re flexible within a day, we can often fit you sooner.
faq.duration_expectation: Estimates include base hours plus extras; we’ll confirm duration before charging.
faq.add_notes: Add any notes—rooms to skip, surfaces to avoid, or priorities—and I’ll save them.
faq.add_supplies: Tell us if you want us to bring supplies; otherwise we use what’s on-site.
faq.eco_supplies: We can bring eco-friendly supplies on request; some add a small fee.
faq.customer_supplies: If you provide supplies, list them so we know what’s available.
faq.cleaner_supplies: Cleaners carry basics on recurring routes; specialty tools can be requested.
faq.add_addons: You can add extras like oven, fridge, windows, deep clean, laundry, or dishes.
faq.add_oven: Oven cleaning is a paid add-on; we degrease racks and doors.
faq.add_fridge: Fridge add-on includes emptying shelves, wiping surfaces, and organizing light items.
faq.add_windows: Window interiors are available where safe access exists; heavy exterior work isn’t included.
faq.add_deep_clean: Deep cleans add time for baseboards, detail dusting, and buildup removal.
faq.add_laundry: Laundry add-on covers washing, drying, and folding within the booking time.
faq.add_dishes: We can wash dishes within the scheduled time or load your dishwasher if available.
faq.move_out: Move-out cleans include inside cabinets and appliances; share if the unit is empty.
faq.post_construction: Post-renovation work needs extra time and masks; we’ll confirm scope and pricing.
faq.short_term_rental: For short-term rentals we can reset linens, tidy, and restock if supplies are provided.
faq.office_afterhours: Office after-hours visits are available in select cities; share access rules and alarms.
faq.hotel_rooms: Hotel-style requests are handled as multi-room cleanings; list rooms and turnover timing.
faq.special_requests: Share special requests early; if we can’t do it, we’ll suggest alternatives.
faq.who_cleans: We match verified cleaners based on route, skills, and your preferences.
faq.background_checks: Providers pass ID, right-to-work, and background checks before getting jobs.
faq.insurance: We carry liability coverage; claims are reviewed with evidence and fair limits.
faq.damages: Report damages within 24h with photos; we’ll review and coordinate repairs or credits.
faq.claims_process: We log the claim, investigate with the cleaner, and share next steps and timelines.
faq.pet_fee: No standard pet fee; tell us about pets so we assign someone comfortable and prepared.
faq.large_home: Large homes may require a longer slot or a team; I’ll adjust the estimate accordingly.
faq.service_areas: We cover major metro areas; share your ZIP/postcode to confirm coverage.
faq.radius: If you’re outside our usual radius, we’ll try to match you with a nearby route.
faq.outside_area: If we can’t serve your area, we’ll notify you and avoid holding funds.
faq.pricing_model: Pricing is time-based with clear add-ons; no hidden platform or card fees.
faq.estimate_factors: Estimates use size, bathrooms, frequency, and extras; heavy buildup may add time.
faq.min_hours: We have a small minimum block to cover travel and setup; it varies by city.
faq.addon_pricing: Add-ons are priced per item or time block; I’ll show the impact in the summary.
faq.deep_clean_pricing: Deep cleans add a surcharge because they take longer than standard visits.
faq.recurring_discount: Weekly or bi-weekly plans earn a recurring discount after the first successful visit.
faq.first_time_discount: New customers may get a one-time welcome discount where available.
faq.coupons: Have a code? Share it and I’ll apply it if valid for your city and service.
faq.taxes: Local taxes or VAT apply based on service location and will appear in the summary.
faq.invoice: We can issue invoices with VAT details; share the company name and number.
faq.weekend_fee: Some weekend or holiday slots may carry a modest surcharge; I’ll flag it upfront.
faq.tip: Tips are optional; you can add one after the visit if you’d like.
faq.price_change: If scope changes, we’ll confirm the new estimate with you before charging.
faq.payment_methods: We accept major cards; some cities also allow invoicing for business clients.
faq.payment_timing: We place an authorization before the visit and capture payment after completion.
faq.payment_hold: Card holds are temporary and adjust if the final amount differs.
faq.refund_timing: Refunds typically post in 3–10 business days depending on your bank.
faq.failed_payment: If a payment fails, update your card or choose invoice where allowed.
faq.receipt: Receipts are emailed after payment; you can also request a PDF.
faq.availability: Tell me your preferred day and time; I’ll check the next slots in your area.
faq.reschedule_policy: You can reschedule up to 24h before without fees; closer changes may be limited.
faq.cancel_policy: Cancel up to 24h before to avoid fees; late cancels may incur a short notice charge.
faq.late_cancel_fee: Late cancellations within 24h may carry a partial service fee.
faq.no_show: If no one can grant access, a no-show fee may apply to cover travel time.
faq.running_late: If we’re running late, we’ll notify you and keep the window updated.
faq.eta_updates: We send ETA updates when the cleaner is en route and upon arrival.
faq.support_contact: Reach support via chat or email; we respond within business hours.
faq.complaint_process: Tell us what went wrong; we document it, coordinate with the cleaner, and follow up.
faq.reclean: If quality misses the mark, we aim to offer a re-clean or credit after review.
faq.missing_items: Report missing items immediately; we pause the account and investigate with the provider.
faq.quality_issue: Share photos or details of any quality issues so we can correct them quickly.
faq.accessibility: We design for WCAG: clear contrasts, keyboard support, and ARIA labels.
faq.language_options: You can switch between English, German, Spanish, or Swedish anytime.
faq.keyboard_access: All quick replies and buttons are reachable via keyboard and screen readers.
faq.quick_replies_explain: Quick replies offer the same choices as typing, keeping the flow structured.
faq.account_access: You can sign in to resume drafts, view history, and manage profile details.
faq.reset_password: Use reset password on the login page; we’ll email a secure link.
faq.saved_addresses: Saved addresses appear during booking so you can switch without retyping.
faq.order_history: Your history shows past visits, invoices, and support tickets.
faq.delete_account: Request account deletion and we’ll remove personal data except required records.
faq.data_export: Ask for a data export and we’ll send a portable file of your booking data.
faq.location_permission: Location access helps autofill addresses; you can deny it and type manually.
faq.disable_location: Turn off location in your browser or device settings; I’ll stop requesting it.
faq.support_channels: Support is available via chat, email, and scheduled callback in supported regions.
faq.provider_apply: To become a provider, complete the onboarding, upload documents, and set availability.
faq.provider_docs: We require ID, right-to-work, and insurance proof where applicable.
faq.provider_verification: We verify documents and may run background checks before granting jobs.
faq.provider_payouts: Payouts are sent to your linked account on a predictable schedule.
faq.provider_feed: The job feed shows nearby requests; status depends on your verification level.
faq.provider_availability: Set your service radius, hours, and preferred routes to get matched.
faq.provider_support: Provider support is available via chat and email for schedule or payout issues.
faq.cleaner_rate: Provider rates depend on city, service type, and experience; we show them per job.
faq.cleaner_safety: We provide safety guidelines, transparent addresses, and support for any incidents.
faq.cleaner_payment_timing: Providers are paid after job completion and confirmation of service.
